name: Garrity v. United Mine Workers of America Welfare and Retirement Fund of 1950, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Garrity v. United Mine Workers of America Welfare & Retirement Fund of 1950

judges: Before Jones, O. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
parties: Garrity v. United Mine Workers of America Welfare and Retirement Fund of 1950, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The orders of the courts below are affirmed. See Myhalyk v. Lewis, 398 Pa. 395, 158 A. 2d 305, cert. denied 362 U.S. 989 (1960).
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: Alexander Unkovie, Edward P. Good, and Kountz, Fry & Meyer, appearing specially and de bene esse, for appellants.
No argument was made nor brief submitted for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Garrity v. United Mine Workers of America Welfare and Retirement Fund of 1950, Appellant.
Submitted March 15, 1961.
Before Jones, O. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
Alexander Unkovie, Edward P. Good, and Kountz, Fry & Meyer, appearing specially and de bene esse, for appellants.
No argument was made nor brief submitted for appellee.
April 17, 1961:
